data.text: @stephen_alan95 I personally liked the raw sound of his voice. But I’m also a big GB fan haha. Michael Crawford is an amazing, classically trained singer, but his vibrato drives me bananas. To each his own, amiright? 😂
@stephen_alan95 I’m pretty sure Antonio Banderas took YEARS of vocal lessons to audition for the part. WE WERE ROBBED

@ShelbySargent_ I think my biggest issue with Gerard Butler is that I wish they had gotten a trained singer to do it, someone with musical theatre training. It's the same reason I hate Russel Crowe in Les Miserables.

@ShelbySargent_ Did you ever watch the 25th anniversary version taped at The Royal Albert Hall with Ramin Karimloo as the Phantom??? Because if you haven't, we gotta real soon. Like now. I'm on my way over.
@ShelbySargent_ But . . . He’s a bad singer. And not a trained singer. Lolol
